original_text: And hath seen in a vision a man named Ananias coming in, and putting his hand on him, that he might receive his sight.
korean_text: 그가 아나니아라 하는 사람이 들어와서 자기에게 안수하여 다시 보게 하는 것을 보았느니라 하시거늘

sentences.original_text: And hath seen in a vision
a man named Ananias coming in
and putting his hand on him
that he might receive his sight
